using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;

namespace Jackpot
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int k, n, i,x,r,s;
            k = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());
            Console.ReadLine();
            while (k-- > 0)
            {
                n = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());
                bool flag = false;
                for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
                {
                    x = i;
                    s = i;
                    while (x != 0)
                    {
                        r = x % 10;
                        s += r;
                        x /= 10;
                    }
                    if (s == n)
                    {
                        flag = true;
                        Console.WriteLine("{0}", i);
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if (flag == false)
                    Console.WriteLine("NONE");
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
}
